catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 268
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: two sets of couples in voluminous noble robes seated on risers with food trays in front of two layers of painted screens; observing two girls with two attendants playing with an object on a low table; small boy at L dancing with doll in hand, and palanquin nearby blossoming tree with basket of peonies at R
title: Doll Festival
